column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Great date or large group spot too! My girlfriend and I are vegetarian and we can always try something new and come up with a new combination of small plates. If you leave without drinking one of the sangria or eating the patatas bravas
column2: you're doing it wrong. The paella is delicious too
column3: but there's lots of it so if you go that route don't fill up on tapas! I'm already looking forward to my next visit. Don't miss it.
